attributes.action: do whatever possible to stop the cult "Church of Scientology" becoming a UK recognised religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU court recently decided it would allow the Church of Scientology to take religion status in Russia (and thus the rest of the EU). As has already been shown by the charities commision, the Church of Scientology are trying to use religion status for tax breaks.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/-Scientology/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
